TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WriteOnlyArrayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WriteOnlyArrayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WriteOnlyArrayAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 当应用于 Windows 运行时组件中的数组参数时，指定传递到该参数的数组的内容仅用于输出。

span.span: When applied to an array parameter in a Windows Runtime component, specifies that the contents of an array that is passed to that parameter are used only for output.

summary.span: 调用方不保证对内容进行了初始化，因此，所调用的方法不应读取内容。

span.span: The caller does not guarantee that the contents are initialized, and the called method should not read the contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中的数组参数你[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]组件通过值进行传递 (`ByVal`在 Visual Basic 中)，你必须对其应用以下属性之一：If an array parameter in your [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component is passed by value (`ByVal` in Visual Basic), you must apply one of the following attributes to it: - 应用属性如果你想要用于仅输入数组的内容。Apply the attribute if you intend the contents of the array to be used for input only. - 应用属性如果你想要使用仅用于输出的数组的内容 （即，该方法设置数组的内容但不会读取）。Apply the attribute if you intend the contents of the array to be used for output only (that is, the method sets the contents of the array but does not read them). 将这两个属性应用于参数导致的错误。Applying both attributes to a parameter causes an error. 有关详细信息，其中包括标准模式进行更改到一个数组，请参阅[将数组传递给 Windows 运行时组件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=251026)Windows 开发人员中心中。For more information, including the standard pattern for making changes to an array, see [Passing arrays to a Windows Runtime component](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=251026) in the Windows Dev Center. > [!IMPORTANT] > 参数具有属性行为也会有所不同具体取决于是否以本机代码还是托管的代码编写调用方。Parameters that have the attribute behave differently depending on whether the caller is written in native code or managed code. 如果调用方是本机代码 （JavaScript 或 Visual c + + 组件扩展），调用的方法无法做出有关内容的原始数组的任何假设。If the caller is native code (JavaScript or Visual C++ component extensions), the called method can't make any assumptions about the contents of the original array. 例如，方法接收的数组可能未初始化，或可能包含默认值。For example, the array the method receives might not be initialized, or might contain default values. 方法应在数组中设置所有元素的值。The method is expected to set the values of all the elements in the array. > > 如果调用方托管代码，调用方的原始数组传递给调用的方法，因为它处于.NET Framework 中的任何方法调用中。If the caller is managed code, the caller's original array is passed to the called method, as it would be in any method call in the .NET Framework. 数组内容是在托管代码中可变的因此该方法可以有选择地读取和更改这些值。Array contents are mutable in managed code, so the method can selectively read and change those values. 务必记住，因为它会影响为编写单元测试这一点[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]组件。This is important to remember because it affects unit tests written for a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component. 如果在托管代码中编写测试，数组的内容将似乎是可变在测试期间，并且可能会不同，如果稍后从本机代码调用该方法的结果。If the tests are written in managed code, the contents of an array will appear to be mutable during testing, and the results are likely to be different if the method is called from native code later. 应用到此特性`out`参数或具有的参数导出模块时，属性将导致错误。Applying this attribute to an `out` parameter or to a parameter that has the attribute causes an error when the module is exported. 将特性应用于具有的参数属性会导致错误，除非该形参还具有 Visual Basic`ByRef`修饰符。Applying the attribute to a parameter that has the attribute causes an error unless the parameter also has the Visual Basic `ByRef` modifier. 在这种情况下，该属性为冗余但允许。In that case, the attribute is redundant but allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
